doc:
Alan Napier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alan_Napier 0 Alan William Napier-Clavering (7 January 1903 – 8 August 1988), better known as Alan Napier, was an English actor. After a decade in West End theatres, he had a long film career in Britain and later, in Hollywood. Napier is best known today for portraying Alfred Pennyworth, Bruce Wayne's butler in the 1960s live-action Batman television series. Alan_William_Napier-Clavering ( 7_January_1903 – 8_August_1988 ) , better_known as Alan_Napier , was an_English_actor . After a_decade in West_End_theatres , he had a_long_film_career in Britain and later , in Hollywood . Napier is_best_known today for portraying Alfred_Pennyworth , Bruce_Wayne 's_butler in the_1960s_live-action_Batman_television_series .
